data.text:
Robert Lepage, filmmaker, art director, Quebec

In honor of Quebec's 400th anniversary celebrations (SociÃ©tÃ© du 400e anniversaire de QuÃ©bec) Quebec-based artist Robert Lepage and his company Ex Machina in collaboration with projection specialists ETC Paris, light and sound supplier Solotech, create le Moulin Ã images (The Image Mill), a multimedia experience taking years of planning, a historical building, 27 projectors, 40,000,000 pixels, 25 km of optic fiber, 100 moving heads an 300 loudspeakers to celebrate Quebec's rich culture and history.

In this video you can catch a glimpse of the largest outdoor projection in the world, Moulin Ã Images.
